item.title: Windows下mysql和python3安装过程
item.author: Peng
item.description: mysql8.0安装过程 https://blog.csdn.net/m0_62808124/article/details/126769669 开启远程访问 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 use mysql; update user set host = '%' where host = 'localhost' and user = 'root'; flush privileges; # 修改密码 ALTER USER 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'root'; flush privileges; #设置允许远程访问
